meanings.definition: Aia (noun): A type of tree native to Hawaii.
meanings.sent1: The aia tree provides shade and beauty in the tropical forest.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant green leaves of the aia tree.
meanings.sent3: The aia tree whispered secrets to the wind, swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Under the canopy of the aia tree, time seemed to slow down.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the aia tree filled the air with a sweet, earthy scent.

meanings.definition: Aia (interjection): An expression of surprise or realization.
meanings.sent1: Aia! I didn't expect to see you here!
meanings.sent2: Aia, now I understand what you meant.
meanings.sent3: Aia, that was a close call!
meanings.sent4: Her sudden revelation was met with an 'aia' from the audience.
meanings.sent5: Aia! The solution to the puzzle finally dawned on me.
